Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

CurrentSensors.description: The current sensors for this power supply.
CurrentSensors.longDescription: This type shall contain properties that describe current sensor readings for a power supply.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Line1.longDescription: This property shall contain the line current, in ampere units, for L1.  The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Current`.  This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L1 measurement.

Line2.longDescription: This property shall contain the line current, in ampere units, for L2.  The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Current`.  This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L2 measurement.

Line3.longDescription: This property shall contain the line current, in ampere units, for L3.  The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Current`.  This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L3 measurement.

Neutral.longDescription: This property shall contain the line current, in ampere units, for the Neutral line.  The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Current`.  This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include a Neutral line measurement.

EnergySensors.description: The energy sensors for this power supply.
EnergySensors.longDescription: This type shall contain properties that describe energy sensor readings for a power supply.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Line1ToLine2.description: The Line 1 to Line 2 energy (kWh) for this power supply.
Line1ToLine2.longDescription: This property shall contain the energy, in kilowatt-hour units, between L1 and L2.  The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `EnergykWh`.  This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L1-L2 measurement.

Line1ToNeutral.description: The Line 1 to Neutral energy (kWh) for this power supply.
Line1ToNeutral.longDescription: This property shall contain the energy, in kilowatt-hour units, between L1 and Neutral.  The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `EnergykWh`.  This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L1-Neutral measurement.

Line2ToLine3.description: The Line 2 to Line 3 energy (kWh) for this power supply.
Line2ToLine3.longDescription: This property shall contain the energy, in kilowatt-hour units, between L2 and L3.  The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `EnergykWh`.  This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L2-L3 measurement.

Line2ToNeutral.description: The Line 2 to Neutral energy (kWh) for this power supply.
Line2ToNeutral.longDescription: This property shall contain the energy, in kilowatt-hour units, between L2 and Neutral.  The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `EnergykWh`.  This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L2-Neutral measurement.

Line3ToLine1.description: The Line 3 to Line 1 energy (kWh) for this power supply.
Line3ToLine1.longDescription: This property shall contain the energy, in kilowatt-hour units, between L3 and L1.  The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `EnergykWh`.  This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L3-L1 measurement.

Line3ToNeutral.description: The Line 3 to Neutral energy (kWh) for this power supply.
Line3ToNeutral.longDescription: This property shall contain the energy, in kilowatt-hour units, between L3 and Neutral.  The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `EnergykWh`.  This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L3-Neutral measurement.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

PowerSensors.description: The power sensors for this power supply.
PowerSensors.longDescription: This type shall contain properties that describe power sensor readings for a power supply.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Line1ToLine2.description: The Line 1 to Line 2 power (W) for this power supply.
Line1ToLine2.longDescription: This property shall contain the power, in watt units, between L1 and L2.  The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Power`.  This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L1-L2 measurement.

Line1ToNeutral.description: The Line 1 to Neutral power (W) for this power supply.
Line1ToNeutral.longDescription: This property shall contain the power, in watt units, between L1 and Neutral.  The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Power`.  This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L1-Neutral measurement.

Line2ToLine3.description: The Line 2 to Line 3 power (W) for this power supply.
Line2ToLine3.longDescription: This property shall contain the power, in watt units, between L2 and L3.  The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Power`.  This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L2-L3 measurement.

Line2ToNeutral.description: The Line 2 to Neutral power (W) for this power supply.
Line2ToNeutral.longDescription: This property shall contain the power, in watt units, between L2 and Neutral.  The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Power`.  This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L2-Neutral measurement.

Line3ToLine1.description: The Line 3 to Line 1 power (W) for this power supply.
Line3ToLine1.longDescription: This property shall contain the power, in watt units, between L3 and L1.  The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Power`.  This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L3-L1 measurement.

Line3ToNeutral.description: The Line 3 to Neutral power (W) for this power supply.
Line3ToNeutral.longDescription: This property shall contain the power, in watt units, between L3 and Neutral.  The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Power`.  This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L3-Neutral measurement.

PowerSupplyMetrics.description: The `PowerSupplyMetrics` schema contains definitions for the metrics of a power supply.
PowerSupplyMetrics.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent the metrics of a power supply unit for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

EnergykWh.description: The energy consumption (kWh) of this unit.
EnergykWh.longDescription: This property shall contain the total energy, in kilowatt-hour units, for this unit that represents the `Total` `ElectricalContext` sensor when multiple energy sensors exist.  The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `EnergykWh`.

FanSpeedPercent.deprecated: This property has been deprecated in favor of `FanSpeedsPercent` to support multiple fans within a power supply.
FanSpeedPercent.description: The fan speed (percent) for this power supply.
FanSpeedPercent.longDescription: This property shall contain the fan speed, in percent units, for this resource.  The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Percent`.

FanSpeedsPercent.longDescription: This property shall contain the fan speeds, in percent units, for this resource.  The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Percent`.

FrequencyHz.description: The frequency (Hz) for this power supply.
FrequencyHz.longDescription: This property shall contain the frequency, in hertz units, for this power supply.

InputCurrentAmps.description: The input current (A) for this power supply.
InputCurrentAmps.longDescription: This property shall contain the input current, in ampere units, for this power supply.  The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Current`.

InputPowerWatts.description: The input power (W) for this power supply.
InputPowerWatts.longDescription: This property shall contain the input power, in watt units, for this power supply.  The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Power`.

InputVoltage.description: The input voltage (V) for this power supply.
InputVoltage.longDescription: This property shall contain the input voltage, in volt units, for this power supply.  The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Voltage`.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

OutputPowerWatts.description: The total power output (W) for this power supply.
OutputPowerWatts.longDescription: This property shall contain the total output power, in watt units, for this power supply.  The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Power`.

PolyPhaseCurrentAmps.description: The input polyphase current readings for this power supply.
PolyPhaseCurrentAmps.longDescription: This property shall contain the input polyphase current sensors for this power supply.

PolyPhaseEnergykWh.description: The input polyphase energy consumption readings for this power supply.
PolyPhaseEnergykWh.longDescription: This property shall contain the input polyphase energy sensors for this power supply.

PolyPhasePowerWatts.description: The input polyphase power readings for this power supply.
PolyPhasePowerWatts.longDescription: This property shall contain the input polyphase power sensors for this power supply.

PolyPhaseVoltage.description: The input polyphase voltage readings for this power supply.
PolyPhaseVoltage.longDescription: This property shall contain the input polyphase voltage sensors for this power supply.

RailCurrentAmps.description: The output currents (A) for this power supply.
RailCurrentAmps.longDescription: This property shall contain the output currents, in ampere units, for this power supply.  The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Current`.  The sensors shall appear in the same array order as the `OutputRails` property in the associated `PowerSupply` resource.

RailPowerWatts.description: The output power readings (W) for this power supply.
RailPowerWatts.longDescription: This property shall contain the output power readings, in watt units, for this power supply.  The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Power`.  The sensors shall appear in the same array order as the `OutputRails` property in the associated `PowerSupply` resource.

RailVoltage.description: The output voltages (V) for this power supply.
RailVoltage.longDescription: This property shall contain the output voltages, in volt units, for this power supply.  The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Voltage`.  The sensors shall appear in the same array order as the `OutputRails` property in the associated `PowerSupply` resource.

Status.description: The status and health of the resource and its subordinate or dependent resources.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the resource.

TemperatureCelsius.description: The temperature (C) for this power supply.
TemperatureCelsius.longDescription: This property shall contain the temperature, in degree Celsius units, for this resource.  The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Temperature`.

ResetMetrics.description: This action resets the summary metrics related to this equipment.
ResetMetrics.longDescription: This action shall reset any time intervals or counted values for this equipment.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

VoltageSensors.description: The voltage sensors for this power supply.
VoltageSensors.longDescription: This type shall contain properties that describe voltage sensor readings for a power supply.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Line1ToLine2.description: The Line 1 to Line 2 voltage (V) for this power supply.
Line1ToLine2.longDescription: This property shall contain the line-to-line voltage, in volt units, between L1 and L2.  The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Voltage`.  This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L1-L2 measurement.

Line1ToNeutral.description: The Line 1 to Neutral voltage (V) for this power supply.
Line1ToNeutral.longDescription: This property shall contain the line-to-line voltage, in volt units, between L1 and Neutral.  The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Voltage`.  This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L1-Neutral measurement.

Line2ToLine3.description: The Line 2 to Line 3 voltage (V) for this power supply.
Line2ToLine3.longDescription: This property shall contain the line-to-line voltage, in volt units, between L2 and L3.  The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Voltage`.  This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L2-L3 measurement.

Line2ToNeutral.description: The Line 2 to Neutral voltage (V) for this power supply.
Line2ToNeutral.longDescription: This property shall contain the line-to-line voltage, in volt units, between L2 and Neutral.  The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Voltage`.  This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L2-Neutral measurement.

Line3ToLine1.description: The Line 3 to Line 1 voltage (V) for this power supply.
Line3ToLine1.longDescription: This property shall contain the line-to-line voltage, in volt units, between L3 and L1.  The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Voltage`.  This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L3-L1 measurement.

Line3ToNeutral.description: The Line 3 to Neutral voltage (V) for this power supply.
Line3ToNeutral.longDescription: This property shall contain the line-to-line voltage, in volt units, between L3 and Neutral.  The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Voltage`.  This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L3-Neutral measurement.

title: #PowerSupplyMetrics.v1_2_0.PowerSupplyMetrics
